messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of seven scholars: Vicky, Amir, Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei and Nisha. You are friends with Vicky, who can either introduce you to Amir or Wim.  Amir is connected with Raj, and Raj is connected with Wei. Wei is donating 10 books, but you do not take any books, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time you ask Vicky to introduce you to Wim, who is connected with Jing, and Jing is connected with Nisha. Nisha is donating 50 books, but you do not take any books, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path from Vicky that leads to the maximum number of books. Which scholar can Vicky connect you with, who will lead to the path with maximum number of books?

As an knowledgeable helper, I have fully understood the task description!  Following this, I can assist we with figuring out which scholar Vicky need connect to have you obtain most number concerning books.  First Let me see, Amir can introduce you to Raj who is also connect in the direction, who is connecting Wei then I do  (522+ books+ via Wei which is obtain through his participation at the end is 10) this will connect in the route direction through which one scholar Amir with his related others will have 52 books together along with additional contribution of 102 other scholarship materials) is  (52 books +  5 scholar +3 times scholar is + by their participation in amount (Ie 10+2 by their direct connection = scholar who connected together will result into getting you the maximum  (2 scholar who are in direction via +1 participation from their total contributions  which by connecting = (directly connected contribution = maximum + in this example by ( Wei( book direct 50 contribution from their total (connective) way for other books. Answer is + total of the other two books along direct route will have (83 directly through ( direct route at 53 other contribution from participation

Now Vicky has a new connection, Reza. Reza is directly connected to Nisha. Remember that you will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Which scholar can Vicky connect you with, will lead to the path with the maximum number of books?
